item.title: Pop Pop Chaos
item.description: 13:42 Friday 07 August 2015 JST Yesterday I released a big update to Pop Pop Chaos; now people can see lots of pretty bubbles! This is all thanks to d3, which uses SVG, designed by W3C in 1999. Unfortunately, at this point the game does not work for mobile users. You can press the buttons button on mobile to go back to the old school buttons. https://archive.is/jU9Xa
